name: Max Tato's Radicool B-Ball 1996
description:
Max Tato's Radicool B-Ball 1996 is the craziest ride you can have with a B-Ball in this year of 1996. Take the ball from your crazy buddies who try to pop it, as their career is over and they HATE IT. The best part is when you jump and take the B-Ball and make a COOL HOOPIE like no other. That's Max Tato-guaranteed.

This First Person Hoopier (FPH) is unlike anything you've seen before. There's speed. There's buddies. There's the B-Ball. And there's... The Hoopies. Come join the perfect game of B-Ball with Max Tato!

Max Tato presents: Max Tato's Radicool B-Ball 1996!

(Made for Slavic Game Jam 2016 in Warsow, Poland, with the theme '90s')
